aside.div: This release includes an initial implementation of FastCGI, drawing from the FastCGI Specification. While the existing functionality wasn't logically altered, it was shuffled around quite a lot and abstracted to accomodate for the new FastCGI functions. The implementation is documented in kfcgi(8), khttp_fcgi_init(3), and khttp_fcgi_parse(3), and khttp_fcgi_parse(3).
Also fixed a bug where calling khttp_free(3) after a prior khttp_parse(3) failure would cause a NULL dereference.
